dict.acceptation: 行政官员；公务员；[体]裁判；高级职员；
官方的，法定的；公职的，公务的；官气十足；正式的；

sent.orig: One can judge from his official cap button that he is a senior official.
sent.trans: 从他所戴的顶珠上可以看出，他是个大官。

sent.orig: And active delegate is different: What they accept is official commission, acting is official volition.
sent.trans: 而主动代表则不同：他们接受的是官方的委托，代理的是官方的意志。

sent.orig: He is a high-level official now; you should not deal with an official relative.
sent.trans: 人家现在可是大官了，你不要冒认官亲。

sent.orig: Xinhua, the official news agency, also issued a commentary saying a speedy official response was warranted.
sent.trans: 新华社，作为官方通讯社，也发表评论文章说政府应该快速作出反应。

sent.orig: The nature of official negligent crime lies in the violation of official attention.
sent.trans: 职务过失犯罪的本质在于违反职务上的注意义务。
